name: F-ist
description:
"女拳主義F-ist" is a 2D action adventure game. In a fictional universe, women completely dominate the fighting arenas. Players will operate the protagonist to participate in the strongest fighting competition. In order to win the championship, players will travel around the world to challenge the best female fighters.

The basic gameplay is as follows:
[↑↓← →] = Block/Option

[← →/spacebar] = Counterattack when the opponent is exhausted/answer option

[Esc] = Exit to the main interface option

The chapters are as follows:
Prologue: I want to participate!

Chapter 1: Lovely and charming villain! Hong Kong teddy girl who swears everytime.

Chapter 2: The Long-lost Chinese Ancient Boxing Technique! The Kung Fu girl who cheats during fighting.

Chapter 3: Is it Ninjutsu? The Japanese ninja girl who plays shandow clone jutsu.
